How to cite?
------------

If you use Cenfind in your publications, we would be grateful if you cite our work with the following:

BÃ¼rgy, L., Weigert, M., Hatzopoulos, G. *et al.* CenFind: a deep-learning pipeline for efficient centriole detection in microscopy datasets. *BMC Bioinformatics* **24**, 120 (2023). https://doi.org/10.1186/s12859-023-05214-2
